content: Financial industry software maker Fidelity National Information Services Inc  has agreed to buy rival SunGard Data Systems Inc for $9.1 billion including debt  in order to get access to Sungard's thousands of lucrative trading and money management clients. | Video

content: Aug 12 Financial industry software maker Fidelity National Information Services Inc has agreed to buy rival SunGard Data Systems Inc for $9.1 billion including debt  in order to get access to Sungard's thousands of lucrative trading and money management clients.
